Commands.CF: CF - Change Figure Syntax: CF <position number> [, [<R/L>] [, [<A/B>] [, [<N/F>]]]]
Commands.CL: CL - Counter Load Syntax: CL <counter number/character string number>
Commands.CP: CP - Compare Counter Syntax: CP <counter number/character string number>
Commands.CR: CR - Counter Read Syntax: CR <counter number/character string number>
Commands.DA: DA - Disable Act Syntax: DA <input bit number>
Commands.DC: DC - Decrement Counter Syntax: DC <counter number>
Commands.DJ: DJ - Draw Joint Syntax: DJ <joint number>, <turning angle>
Commands.DL: DL - DeleteLine Syntax: DL <line number (a)> [, [<line number (b)> [, [<step (a)> [, [<step (b)>]]]]]]
Commands.DR: DR - Data Read Syntax: DR [<output bit number>]
Commands.DS: DS - Draw Straight Syntax: DS [<travel distance in X>], [<travel distance in Y>], [<travel distance in Z>]
Commands.DW: DW - Draw Syntax: DW [<travel distance in X>], [<travel distance in Y>], [<travel distance in Z>]
Commands.EA: EA - Enable Act Syntax: EA [<+/->] <input bit number>, <line number> [, [<branching approach>]]
Commands.EQ: EQ - Equal Syntax: EQ <compare value>, <branching line number>
Commands.ER: ER - Error Read Syntax: ER [<alarm history number>]
Commands.GC: GC - Grip Close Syntax: GC [<hand number>]
Commands.GO: GO - Grip Open Syntax: GO [<hand number>]
Commands.GP: GP - Grip Pressure Syntax: GP <starting gripping force>, <retained gripping force>, <starting gripping force retention rime>
Commands.GS: GS - Go Sub Syntax: [<line number>] [, [<program name>]]
Commands.GT: GT - Go To Syntax: GT <line number>
Commands.HO: HO - Home Syntax: HO [<origin setting approach>]
Commands.IC: IC - Increment Counter Syntax: IC <counter number>
Commands.ID: ID - Input Direct Syntax: ID [<input bit number>]
Commands.INP: INP - Input Syntax: INP <channel number>, <counter number/position number/character string number> [, [<contents selection>]]
Commands.JRC: JRC - Joint Roll Change Syntax: JRC <[+]1/-1>
Commands.LG: LG - If Larger Syntax: LG <compared value/character string number>, <branching line number>
Commands.LR: LR - Line Read Syntax: LR [<line number>]
Commands.MA: MA - Move Approach Syntax: MA <position number (a)>, <position number (b)> [, [<O/C>]]
Commands.MC: MC - Moce Continuous Syntax: MC <position number (a)>, <position number (b)> [, [<O/C>]]
Commands.MJ: MJ - Move Joint Syntax: MJ [<waist joint angle>], [<shoulder joint angle>], [<elbow joint angle>], [<twist joint angle>], [<pitch joint angle>], [<roll joint angle>]
Commands.MP: MP - Move Position Syntax: MP [<X coordinate value>], [<Y coordinate value>], [<Z coordinate value>], [<A turn angle>], [<B turn angle>], [<C turn angle>] [, [<R/L>] [, [<A/B>] [, [<N/F>]]]]
Commands.MPB: MPB - Move Playback Syntax: MPB [<speed>], [<timer>], [<output ON>], [<Output OFF>], [<input ON>], [<input OFF>], [, [<interpolation>, [<X coordinate>], [<Y coordinate>], [<Z coordinate>], [<A turning angle>], [<B turning angle>], [<C turning angle>] [, [<R/L>] [, [<A/B>] [, [<N/F>]]]] [, [<O/C>]]]
Commands.MPC: MPC - Move Playback Continuous Syntax: MPC [<interpolation>], [<X coordinate>], [<Y coordinate>], [<Z coordinate>], [<A turning angle>], [<B turning angle>], [<C turning angle>] [, [<R/L>] [, [<A/B>] [, [<N/F>]]]] [, [<O/C>]]]
Commands.MR: MR - Move R Syntax: MR <position number (a)>, <position number (b)>, <position number (c)> [, [<O/C>]]
Commands.MRA: MRA - Move R A Syntax: MRA <position number> [, [<O/C>]]
Commands.MS: MS - Move Straight Syntax: MS <position number> [, [<O/C>]]
Commands.MT: MT - Move Tool Syntax: MT <position number>, [<travel distance>] [, [<O/C>]]
Commands.MTS: MTS - Move Tool Straight Syntax: MTS <position number>, [<travel distance>] [, [<O/C>]]
Commands.NE: NE - If Not Equal Syntax: NE <compared value/character string number>, <branching line number>
Commands.OB: OB - Output Bit Syntax: OB [<+/->] <bit number>
Commands.OC: OC - Output Counter Syntax: OC <counter number> [, [<output bit>] [, [<bit width>]]]
Commands.OD: OD - Output Direct Syntax: OD <output data> [, [<output bit number>] [, [<bit width>]]]
Commands.OPN: OPN - Open Syntax: OPN <channel number>, <device number>
Commands.PA: PA - Pallet Assign Syntax: PA <pallet number>, <number of column grid points>, <number of row grid points>
Commands.PC: PC - Position Clear Syntax: PC <position number (a)> [, [<position number (b)>]]
Commands.PD: PD - Position Define Syntax: PD <position number>, [<X coordinate>], [<Y coordinate>], [<Z coordinate>], [<A turning angle>], [<B turning angle>], [<C turning angle>] [, [<R/L>] [, [<A/B>]] [, [<N/F>]]] [, [<O/C>]]
Commands.PL: PL - Position Load Syntax: PL <position number (a)>, <position number (b)>
Commands.PMR: PMR - Parameter Read Syntax: PMR ["<parameter name>"]
Commands.PMW: PMW - Parameter Writing Syntax: PMW "<parameter name>", "<parameter contents>"
Commands.PR: PR - Position Read Syntax: PR [<position number>]
Commands.PRN: PRN - Print Syntax: PRN <counter value> | <position coordinates> | "<character string data>"
Commands.PW: PW - Pulse Wait Syntax: PW <positioning pulse>
Commands.PX: PX - Position Exchange Syntax: PX <position number (a)>, <position number (b)>
Commands.QN: QN - Questio Number Syntax: QN [<program name>]
Commands.RC: RC - Repeat Cycle Syntax: RC <number of repeated cycles>
Commands.RN: RN - Run Syntax: RN [<start line number> [, <end line number> [, <program name>]]]
Commands.SC: SC - Set Counter Syntax: SC <counter number/character string number>, [<counter set value/charaster string set value>]
Commands.SD: SD - Speed Define Syntax: <moving speed> [, <first order time constant> [, <acceleration time>, <deceleration time> [, <CNT setting>]]]
Commands.SF: SF - Shift Syntax: SG <position number (a)>, <position number (b)>
Commands.SM: SM - If Smaller Syntax: SM <compared value/character string number>, <branching line number>
Commands.SP: SP - Speed Syntax: SP <speed level> [, <H/L> [, <CNT setting>]]
Commands.STR: STR - Step Read Syntax: STR [<step number>]
Commands.TB: TB - Test Bit Syntax: TB [<+/->] <bit number>, <branching line number>
Commands.TBD: TBD - Test Bit Direct Syntax: TBD [<+/->] <input bit number>, <branching line number>
Commands.XO: XO - Exclusive Or Syntax: XO <operation data>
